thread.section_title: Centauro Rent a Car opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Centauro Rent a Car | centauro.net
thread.title: Annie
thread.title_full: Centauro Rent a Car evaluado por Annie

author: Annie
title: Annie
text:
Would highly recommend Centauro. Have used many car hire firms over the past 12 years. The shuttle bus was waiting on arrival, and our car pick up was dealt with quickly and courteously, without any attempt to persuade us to upgrade. we were pleasantly surprised with the Ford Focus as had requested a small car, so this was a bonus at a very good price.
Again, drop-ff was dealt with quickly and efficiently and the shuttle bus was available to take us back to the airport immediately.
No complaints at all.
